content.question: A particle traveling on the <math alttext="x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-axis has position <math alttext="x of t" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> at time <math alttext="t" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. The graph of the particle’s velocity <math alttext="v of t" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>v</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math> is shown above for <math alttext="0 is less than or equal to t, which is less than or equal to 4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following expressions gives the total distance traveled by the particle over the time interval <math alttext="0 is less than or equal to t, which is less than or equal to 4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parenthesis, x of 0, minus x of 2, close parenthesis, plus, open parenthesis, x of 4, minus x of 2, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>(</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>)</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>(</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>)</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, x of 2, minus x of 0, close parenthesis, plus, open parenthesis, x of 2, minus x of 4, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>(</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>)</mo><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>(</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>)</mo><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parenthesis, x of 0, minus x of 2, close parenthesis, plus, open parenthesis, x of 4, minus x of 2, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>(</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>)</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>(</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>)</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 4.2: Straight-Line Motion - Connecting Position, Velocity, and Acceleration

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
